content: I noted on the internet today something about "...if the US had to support a third war against N Korea, we could do it". Does insanity rule the world? We have federalized tens of thousands of National Guard and Reserve forces in support of actions in Iraq and Afghanistan, many doing second, third (or more) tours, with accompanying PTSD. Just spitballing here, but is it possible that the financial collapse throughout the world and the spreading thin of our armed forces is a conspiracy to bring down our nation? Don't forget, CHINA, which is our biggest debt owner has always been assumed to be our next enemy for WW III. Comments?

title: Big Deal Conspiracy Stuff

content: Unfortunately with the advent of the internet there are no secrets Just confused masses of humanity tying to assimilate the vast collections of both a mix of ligitimate information and misinformation. Trying to put things in perspective based on thier personal values and beliefs instead of trusting thier God given common sense, Thus adding to the confusion. If it walks like a duck, Quacks like a duck,and looks like a duck, Then it must be a goat because some official report says so and can be backed by the internet blogs. And thats where we are today IMHO. A truly dumbed down society. The little leaguers have come of age and Peters principal is in full bloom. GOD BLESS AMERICA>
